boxplot from r-graph-gallery "most basic boxplot"

```{r}
# Load ggplot2
library(ggplot2)
 
# The mtcars dataset is natively available
# head(mtcars)
 
# A really basic boxplot.
ggplot(, aes(x=as.factor(Size), y=SubstrateDiameter)) + 
    geom_boxplot(fill="slateblue", alpha=0.2) + 
    xlab("cyl")
```
